means: 指挥，控制( command的现在分词)

sentence.Network_en: What other home offers such a commanding view of the capital?
sentence.Network_cn: 还有其他的房子能像这幢一样俯瞰首都吗？

sentence.Network_en: Lovett was a tall, commanding man with a waxed gray mustache.
sentence.Network_cn: 洛维特是个威严的高个男人，蓄着灰白的八字胡。

sentence.Network_en: He got permission from his commanding officer to join me.
sentence.Network_cn: 他得到指挥官的许可来与我会合。

means.word_mean: 占有险要地位的,居高临下
威风凛凛的,外表庄严的

entry.def: If you are in a commanding position or situation, you are in a strong or powerful position or situation.

example.ex: Right now you're in a more commanding position than you have been for ages...
example.tran: 现在你的权力超过了多年以来任何时候。

example.ex: The French vessel has a commanding lead.

entry.def: If you describe someone as commanding, you mean that they are powerful and confident.

example.ex: Lovett was a tall, commanding man with a waxed gray mustache...
example.tran: 洛维特是个威严的高个男人，蓄着灰白的八字胡。

example.ex: The voice  at the other end of the line was serious and commanding.
example.tran: 电话另一端传来庄重而威严的声音。

entry.tran: 居高临下的;视野开阔的
entry.def: If a building has a commanding position, it is high up and has good views of the surrounding area.

example.ex: The size of the castle and its commanding position still impress the visitor today...
example.tran: 城堡很大，加上其居高临下的位置，至今仍让参观者赞叹不已。

example.ex: What other home offers such a commanding view of the capital?
example.tran: 还有其他的房子能像这幢一样俯瞰首都吗？

means.word_mean: 1. of the highest rank; used of persons;
2. used of a height or viewpoint;

sentences.sentence: "looked up at the castle dominating the countryside"

auth_sentence.content: Mating Call is correspondingly confident, at times commanding even.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mating Call is correspondingly confident, at times commanding even.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mating Call is correspondingly confident, at times commanding even.

auth_sentence.content: Tenants are being pickier and commanding shorter contracts.
auth_sentence.res_content: Tenants are being pickier and commanding shorter contracts.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Tenants are being pickier and commanding shorter contracts.

auth_sentence.content: But he was not the commanding officer on the base.
auth_sentence.res_content: But he was not the commanding officer on the base.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But he was not the commanding officer on the base.

sentences.en: The commanding officer is putting Sergeant Green in for the Victoria Cross.
sentences.cn: 指挥官提议颁发给格林中士维多利亚十字勋章。

sentences.en: The president is a man with a commanding appearance.
Our team has a commanding lead of forty to twenty.
sentences.cn: 我们队以40比20的比分遥遥领先。
